section Section1;
shared BaseUrl = "##BASE_URL##" meta [IsParameterQuery=true, Type="Text", IsParameterQueryRequired=true];
shared Locale = "en" meta [IsParameterQuery=true, List={"en","ar-MA","ar-SA","ca-ES","da-DK","de-DE","el-GR","en-CA","en-GB","es-CL","es-ES","fr-BE","fr-FR","hr-HR","hu-HU","it-IT","kl-GL","lb-LU","lv-LV","mi","nb-NO","nl-BE","nl-NL","pl-PL","pt-BR","ro-RO","sr-Latn","sr-SP","sv-SE","tr-TR"}, DefaultValue="en", Type="Text", IsParameterQueryRequired=true];

    Source = "100"
in

            Record.FieldNames(Table.ExpandListColumn(Source, "Column1")[Column1]{0}), 
            Record.FieldNames(Table.ExpandListColumn(Source, "Column1")[Column1]{0})
            )
            otherwise #table({"id", "project_id", "title", "description", "location", "location_point", "attendees_count", "start_at", "end_at", "created_at", "updated_at", "title_multiloc", "description_multiloc", "location_multiloc", "data_refreshed_at"}, {}),
  #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(ExpandColumn, {{"id", type text}, {"project_id", type text}, {"title", type text}, {"description", type text}, {"location", type text}, {"location_point", type text}, {"attendees_count", Int64.Type}, {"start_at", type datetime}, {"end_at", type datetime}, {"created_at", type datetime}, {"updated_at", type datetime}, {"data_refreshed_at", type datetime}}),
  #"Duplicated Column" = Table.DuplicateColumn(#"Changed Type", "created_at", "created_at_date"),
  #"Changed Type1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Duplicated Column", {{"created_at_date", type date}}),
  #"Transform columns" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Changed Type1", {{"title_multiloc", type text}, {"description_multiloc", type text}, {"location_multiloc", type text}}),
  #"Replace errors" = Table.ReplaceErrorValues(#"Transform columns", {{"title_multiloc", null}, {"description_multiloc", null}, {"location_multiloc", null}})
in
  #"Replace errors";

shared ApiAccessToken = let
    Source = () => let 
        AccessTokenCall  = Web.Contents(BaseUrl, 
            [
                RelativePath= "authenticate", 
                Headers = [#"Content-Type"= "application/json", #"Accept"= "application/json"], 
                Content = Text.ToBinary("{
                    ""auth"": {
                        ""client_id"": """ & ClientID & """,
                        ""client_secret"": """ & ClientSecret & """
                        }
                    }"
                )
            ]
        )
    in
        AccessTokenCall
in
    Source;
shared ApiGET = let
  Source = (RelativeUrl as text) =>
    let
      // These variables configured based on the API structure. Query folding options used in functions might also change with API version
      //Global Variables
      BaseUrl = #"BaseUrl", 
      LimitPerPage = #"LimitPerPage",  // number of max items returned in one API call
      Locale = #"Locale",  // number of max items returned in one API call
      AccessTokenCall = ApiAccessToken(), 
      FirstCall = Web.Contents(
        BaseUrl, 
        [
          RelativePath = RelativeUrl & "?locale=" & Locale & "&page_size=" & LimitPerPage, 
          ManualStatusHandling = {200, 400, 401, 403, 404, 429, 500, 503}, 
          Headers = [
            #"Content-Type" = "application/json", 
            Authorization   = "Bearer " & Json.Document(AccessTokenCall, 65001)[jwt]
          ]
        ]
      ), 
      FirstCallMetaData = Value.Metadata(FirstCall), 
      PageCount = 
        if FirstCallMetaData[Response.Status] = 200 then
          Json.Document(FirstCall)[#"meta"][#"total_pages"]
        else
          null,  // # Pages in total
      GetData = (Page) =>
        let
          PageOffset = Number.ToText(Page), 
          NextCall = Web.Contents(
            BaseUrl, 
            [
              RelativePath = RelativeUrl
                & "?locale="
                & Locale
                & "&page_size="
                & LimitPerPage
                & "&page_number="
                & PageOffset, 
              ManualStatusHandling = {200, 400, 401, 403, 404, 429, 500, 503}, 
              Headers = [
                #"Content-Type" = "application/json", 
                Authorization   = "Bearer " & Json.Document(AccessTokenCall, 65001)[jwt]
              ]
            ]
          ), 
          MetaData = Value.Metadata(NextCall), 
          Delay = DelayFn(0.1), 
          Response = 
            if MetaData[Response.Status] = 200 then // check the call status if ok
              (
                let
                  Json = Json.Document(NextCall), 
                  Value = Table.AddColumn(
                    Table.FromList(
                      Record.ToTable(Json){0}[Value], 
                      Splitter.SplitByNothing(), 
                      null, 
                      null, 
                      ExtraValues.Error
                    ), 
                    "Data", 
                    each Record.AddField([Column1], "data_refreshed_at", Delay)
                  )[Data]
                in
                  Value
              )
            else
              null
        in
          Response, 
      PageIndices = {1 .. PageCount}, 
      Pages = List.Transform(PageIndices, each GetData(_)), 
      ToTable = Table.FromList(Pages, Splitter.SplitByNothing(), null, null, ExtraValues.Error)
    in 
      ToTable
in
  Source;
shared DelayFn = let
    Source = (secondsInput as number) => let
        //Find current time
        One = DateTime.LocalNow(),
        //Define Wait function
        Wait = (seconds as number, action as function) => 
                if (List.Count(
                 List.Generate(
                  () => DateTimeZone.LocalNow() + #duration(0,0,0,seconds), 
                  (x) => DateTimeZone.LocalNow() < x, 
                  (x) => x)
                  ) = 0) 
                   then null else action(),
        //Call Wait function to wait 5 seconds
        //then return the current time again
        Two = Wait(secondsInput,DateTime.LocalNow),
        //Display start time, finish time, and duration
        //Output = "Start Time: " & DateTime.ToText(One) & 
        //               " Finish Time:" & DateTime.ToText(Two) & 
        //               " Difference: " & Duration.ToText(Two-One)
        Output = DateTime.ToText(Two)
    in
        Output
in
    Source;
